referenceFunction.localName: transport, freight, light commercial vehicle {ZA}| transport, freight, light commercial vehicle, all, to generic market for transport, freight, light commercial vehicle | APOS, U

geography.text: The inventory is modelled for South Africa

representativeness.extrapolations: This dataset has been extrapolated from year 2019 to the year of the calculation (2021). The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.

person.name: Lucia Valsasina valsasina@ecoinvent.org Technoparkstrasse 1, 8005 Zurich, Switzerland is active author: False

exchange.name: transport, freight, light commercial vehicle {ZA}| transport, freight, light commercial vehicle, all, to generic market for transport, freight, light commercial vehicle | APOS, U
transport, freight, light commercial vehicle, EURO1 {ZA}| market for transport, freight, light commercial vehicle, EURO1 | APOS, U
exchange.generalComment:
(1,1,2,1,1,na) Calculated from the production volumes.
The production volume is taken from the transport, freight, light commercial vehicle unregulated, EURO1 and EURO2 activities.
It is estimated, that 50% of the production volume of this transport is transfered to the generic market for transport, freight,light commercial vehicle. Which means, that 50% of people using this transport do not know or do not care about the EURO class.
